additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Glycerin, Oxidized Polyethylene, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Betaine, Salicylic Acid, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cetyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Steareth-21, Behenyl Alcohol, PPG-30, Steareth-2, Fragrance, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Benzyl Salicylate, Carnosine, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Disodium EDTA , Ascorbic Acid

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with the eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. If skin or eye irritation develops, discontinue use.

description: Formulated with oxygenated derma-beads to clean skin without over-drying that gently smoothes skin. For more information on this cleanser and other Regenerist products to complete your skincare regimen go to our websiteFormula with oxygenated derma-beads cleanses and gently smoothes skin.
name: Regenerist Cream Cleanser
